definition[0]: bootleg alcohol, software, or recordings are made and sold illegally
definition[1]: bootleg jeans, trousers etc become wider at the end of each leg
definition[2]: an illegal recording of a music performance
definition[3]: to illegally make or sell alcohol, or to illegally make or sell copies of software or recordings
example[1]: 900 bootleg videos of pop concerts have been seized by trading standards officers.
